thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 5 of 259
thread.title: Lindsey

author: Lindsey
title: Lindsey
text: I have purchased several decals from DIY Lettering, and they all looked even better in real life than they did on the computer. The website is very user-friendly, and the staff is helpful if you need extra assistance. I have had one of their decals on my kayak for over 2 years, and it's still sticking great, despite hundreds of hours of sunset and lake water. Very, very impressed with this company and the vinyl lettering they produce.
